build.buildCommand: pnpm install && pnpm --filter @breakagency/api exec prisma generate && pnpm --filter @breakagency/shared build && pnpm --filter @breakagency/api build && echo 'Build completed successfully'

deploy.startCommand: cd apps/api && NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings' NODE_ENV=production sh -c 'npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma 2>&1 | grep -q "P3005" || true' && node dist/server.js
